API¶

This document explains API of Han-gul asciimation project.

Test Log: - AsciiAnimation module updated

Package¶

Package description

DocuTest.start()¶

This function is for the start this module running

Hangul Ascii Animation Project Module

Module A¶

ModuleA description

class DocuTest.docuModuleA.TestClassA(argA, argB=0.0)¶

This test class A is for the initial class of docuModule A.

calculateArguments(argC, argD)¶

This function calculate summation of class argument A,B and input argument C,D :param argC: Additional arguments for class argument A. :param argD: Additional arguments for class argument B. :return: Summation of all arguments, A,B,C, and D.

getArgumentA()¶

This function could get the argument A :return:

DocuTest.docuModuleA.public_ftn_docuModuleA(argA, argB)¶

This function is public function of docuModuleA

Args:
argA (int): Input argument A argB (int): Input argument B
Returns:
int. argument A + argument B

FontAnalyzer¶

Font Analyzer description

class AsciiAnimation.fontAnalyzer.FontAnalyzer¶

Font Analyzer 클래스입니다.

Note Now it’s only for the 2byte Han-gul(Korean word) TTF(True type font).

init_setFontStartEndIdx(startIdx, endIdx)¶

Setup the font start and end index during the initialize step. :param startIdx: (int) start index of the font :param endIdx: (int) end index of the font :return: Nothing

init_setuKoreanCharacterList(uKoreanString)¶

Setup the Korean characters during the initialize step. :param uKoreanString: Unicode Korean Characters. :return: Nothing
